LightningComponentBundle.description: Configurable map component for displaying locations via Google Maps API.

property.name: height
property.label: Map Height
property.description: Height of the map component in percent or pixels. The default is 400px.

property.name: width
property.label: Map Width
property.description: Width of the map component in percent or pixels. The default is 100%.

property.name: listView
property.label: List View
property.description: Displays or hides the list of locations. Valid values are visible, hidden, or auto.

property.name: zoomLevel
property.label: Zoom Level
property.description: Supports zoom levels from 1 to 20. If not specified, the component calculates a zoom level to accommodate the markers in the map.

property.name: titleField
property.label: Location Title
property.description: API name of the field that contains the location title. The default is the Name field.

property.name: cityField
property.label: City Field
property.description: API name of the field that contains the city.

property.name: countryField
property.label: Country Field
property.description: API name of the field that contains the country.

property.name: postalCodeField
property.label: Postal Code Field
property.description: API name of the field that contains the postal code.

property.name: stateField
property.label: State Field
property.description: API name of the field that contains the state.

property.name: streetField
property.label: Street Field
property.description: API name of the field that contains the street.
